title: SY23, Kenwood Academy: Notices of 5 and 10 day student unexcused absences and notices of truancy intervention services

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Illinois Freedom of Information Act., I hereby request the following records:

copies of notices sent by Kenwood Academy to parent or guardian of students who have 5 and 10 days of unexcused absences by school for the 2022-2023 school year. Please redact any personally identifying information for the parent, guardian, and student.

copies of notices sent "pupil's parent or guardian a letter, by certified mail, return receipt requested, notifying the parent or guardian that he or she is subjecting himself or herself to truancy intervention services", by Kenwood Academy for the 2022-2023 school year. Please redact any personally identifying information for the parent, guardian, and student.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Forest Gregg
